item.title: 4 LaTeX
item.description: Handy links for LaTeX Detexify automatic recognition of handwritten symbols

item.title: Cute Links
item.description: When numbers are so big that it’s too hard to get an understanding of their magnitude some resources might come handy: the mesure of things to compare the quantity to other more-or-less well-known things; or numbermatics to get facts on the number itself.
